casebody.data:
In Re: Todd W. Short 46P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2016

Mr. Todd Short, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of July 2016 by Petitioner for leave to amendment to Certificate of Service on Petitioner's Motion for Expedited Consideration of Petitioner's Writ of Certiorari Filed on 30 June 2016:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of July 2016."
